/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. 

Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. Pedestrians can be seen as well, going about their day, contributing to the lively atmosphere. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
